articles.description: Organisers slash ticket prices as Indian fans make beeline for Qatar.
articles.content: Tickets for a group game of the FIFA World Cup in Qatar later this year will cost less than the price of catching live IPL action at Mumbais Wankhede Stadium. While a fan will be paying 250 Qatari Ri… [+3216 chars]

articles.author: Pratyush Raj
articles.title: Umran Malik: From a ‘Gully Boy’ to making 150kph the new normal in IPL - The Indian Express
articles.description: The father, coach, and mentors track the rise and rise of India's fastest bowler from Jammu & Kashmir.
articles.content: No one asks me for extra chillies and coriander leaves. They dont negotiate prices. The perks of being the father of the fastest Indian pacer are small but sweet for Abdul Rashid, a fruit seller in J… [+6462 chars]
